title: Not Enough IP/RP

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I've had this problem several times in the past and it's starting to get really annoying. Please fix this !

replies.body:
It's a bug that appears on the Beta Client that pops up on occasion. We're certainly looking into it, but for now, let's bypass this! You should be able to bypass this by launching into the *Legacy Client* from the login screen to complete your purchase.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you continue to experience issues after that quick workaround attempt.
Another issue i seem to be having with the beta client is that when i launch legacy client, nothing happens.
What happens if you try launching League from the **lol.client.admin.exe** file from your installation directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) before trying to launch the Legacy Client?
same thing happening to me right now. I just want to play league of legends. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
